name: Fathom Enterprise
summary_and_recommendation: Fathom Enterprise presents LOW RISK with strong encryption, compliance certifications, and good transparency. The tool offers training data opt-out and maintains robust security practices. While enterprise admin controls are limited, the overall risk profile is acceptable for most organizational use cases. Recommend for general use with standard enterprise monitoring.
primary_use_case: AI-powered meeting recording, transcription, and summarization
documentation_tier: Tier 2: Private enterprise documentation (DPAs, some vendor communication)
assessment_notes: Good public documentation available with privacy policy and security details. SOC 2 Type II certification provides additional validation. Some gaps in enterprise-specific admin control documentation.

recommendations.title: Implement Enhanced Admin Controls
recommendations.description: Deploy additional organizational controls and monitoring for user activity due to limited native admin dashboard capabilities

recommendations.title: Establish Meeting Recording Governance
recommendations.description: Create policies for meeting recording consent and data handling given automatic recording capabilities

recommendations.title: Enable Training Data Opt-Out
recommendations.description: Ensure organizational training data opt-out is configured to prevent customer data from being used for AI model training

recommendations.title: Monitor Third-Party Integrations
recommendations.description: Regularly review and audit connected third-party applications (Zoom, Google, Microsoft) for data sharing

detailed_assessment.summary_and_recommendation: Fathom Enterprise presents LOW RISK with strong encryption, compliance certifications, and good transparency. The tool offers training data opt-out and maintains robust security practices. While enterprise admin controls are limited, the overall risk profile is acceptable for most organizational use cases. Recommend for general use with standard enterprise monitoring.

geographic_control.justification: Known secure regions (US, EU) with contracts - All data is stored in AWS cloud data centres within the United States and Canada, providing geographic control within secure jurisdictions.

encryption_standards.justification: Enterprise-Grade Encryption - AES-256 encryption at rest and in transit + vendor-managed keys + published encryption specifications - Tool uses industry standard AES-256 encryption for RDS and S3 storage, with end-to-end encryption and 128-bit SSL for communications.

data_retention.justification: Clear Limited Retention - Specific retention periods documented (â‰¤90 days) + automatic deletion procedures + user deletion controls - Privacy policy indicates data is stored 'for as long as necessary to fulfill purposes' with measures to render data irrecoverable upon deletion, though specific timeframes not clearly defined.

model_training.justification: Opt-out available with clear process - Documentation shows 'Control to opt out of grant out of data usage for model training or product improvements, in full or in part', providing users with training data opt-out capabilities.

data_sharing.justification: No third-party sharing - Privacy policy explicitly states 'We do not sell Meeting Content Information or information about your meeting attendees to anyone' and limits data sharing to service providers necessary for service delivery.

admin_management.justification: Basic User Management - Simple user list + add/remove users + basic permissions only - Fathom appears to offer basic user management capabilities through connected third-party systems (Google/Microsoft) but lacks comprehensive enterprise admin dashboard features. As an established enterprise vendor, 50% reduction in missing documentation penalty applies.

audit_capabilities.justification: Comprehensive Auditing - Real-time activity logs + exportable reports + user action tracking + data access logs + compliance reporting features - SOC 2 Type II certification indicates comprehensive audit capabilities and logging systems are in place to meet compliance requirements.

integration.justification: Limited Integration - SSO only + no provisioning + minimal enterprise features - Tool supports Google/Microsoft SSO integration but lacks comprehensive SCIM provisioning and advanced enterprise identity management features.

regulatory_violations.justification: Mostly Compliant - Basic compliance certifications + privacy policy compliant with major regulations + some gaps in specialized requirements - Tool maintains SOC 2 Type II certification, HIPAA, and GDPR compliance, with documented privacy policy meeting regulatory requirements.

data_processing_transparency.justification: Basic Transparency - General data processing description + retention periods stated + some third-party relationships disclosed - Privacy policy provides general data processing information and discloses third-party relationships, though lacks detailed data flow diagrams.

documentation_and_support.justification: Good Documentation - Clear privacy policy + basic security documentation + responsive support + annual transparency reports - Fathom provides comprehensive privacy policy, security documentation through trust center, and maintains SOC 2 Type II certification demonstrating good transparency practices.
